item.description: Usually a fun place to chat, share a few drinks and dance the night away with others in our own age group...the band is the Carl Ayotte Band. If interested in meeting earlier for dinner post a comment in your reply.
item.how_to_find_us: meet at tables along the back wall next to the door

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dancing at the Station
